Title: A Very Potter Sequel
Writer: Brian Holden, Matt Lang, Nick Lang
Actors: Darren Criss, Joey Richter, Bonnie Gruesen, Lauren Lopez
Plot: Picking up where A very Potter Musical left off Voldemort has been destoryed however the death eaters led by Lucuis Malfoy haven't given up. They travel back in time to the hero's first year at Hogwarts to destroy him before he can destroy them.
